comments.body:
These are optional fields but nice to have:
```suggestion
  summary: Utilities to build the dye-score metric from OpenWPM javascript call data.
  dev_url: https://github.com/mozilla/dye-score/
  doc_url: https://dyescore.readthedocs.io/
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +45,49 @@  license: MPL-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Utilities to build the dye-score metric from OpenWPM javascript call data.
  dev_url: https://github.com/mozilla/dye-score/
  doc_url: https://dyescore.readthedocs.io/

comments.body:
Looking at this again, I think this could be a [noarch](http://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html?highlight=noarch#noarch-python) package:
```suggestion
  noarch: python
  name: {{ name }}
```
